description: This file defines logging macros for different log levels (INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERR) using fprintf to stderr. It includes thread ID and source location in the logs, facilitating debugging in multi-threaded environments.

methods.name: LOGINFO
methods.description: Macro for logging informational messages, outputs formatted message with thread ID, source info, and message to stderr.

methods.name: LOGDBG
methods.description: Macro for logging debug messages with thread ID, source info, and message.

methods.name: LOGWARN
methods.description: Macro for logging warning messages with thread ID, source info, and message.

methods.name: LOGERR
methods.description: Macro for logging error messages with thread ID, source info, and message.
